steps.name: Given a room with dimensions "10" by "10"
And a hoover starting at position "3", "4"
And the following patches of dirt: "1,1;2,2;2,4;4,4"
When the hoover moves according to "NESWWNWNESNENNNNN"
Then the final position of the hoover should be "2", "9"
